subject: Baseball
Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Dr. Anthony Galea, who is accused of distributing performance-enhancing drugs to professional athletes in the United States, treated Alex Rodriguez after hip surgery in 2009.
snippet: Dr. Anthony Galea, who is accused of distributing performance-enhancing drugs to professional athletes in the United States, treated Alex Rodriguez after hip surgery in 2009.
